```{r, setup, echo=FALSE,include=FALSE}
library(reticulate)
```


```{python}
#times table code
print('Multiplication Table')
for i in range(1 ,13):
  for j in range(1, 13):
    print('{0} times {1} is: {2}'.format(i,j,i*j))
  print('-----------------------')
```
